about_the_game:
Manickologi is a game about getting sidetracked on your way back home. Follow mani the manickologist and his robot friend Stefan on their adventure. Swap between characters to make use of their unique skillsets. Collect hidden treasures and complete quests. Level up your combat skills and craft exciting new gadgets in this sandbox adventure.

Explore the vibrant world of Manickologi, an open-world adventure game with puzzles, collectibles and action-combat.

Key features

Exploration

Freely venture the world of Manickologi in search of rocket fuel and hidden treasures. Explore several islands all with different biomes.

Combat

Make use of some of Stefan's combat abilities to defeat Cognimals. Level him up, attach mods and unlock a variety of combat skills by learning knowledge about the world.

Gadgets

Collect gadgets and add them to Mani's toolkit. These gadgets will be useful when exploring harder to reach areas or solving puzzles.

Mounts

Sine species of Cognimals are friendly and will let you mount them. Collect many different types of mounts used to travel land, water and air.

Collectibles

Find hidden treasures, knowledge and other collectibles around the world.

name: Manickologi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 5th gen
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
